## `{ggplot2}`

```{r }
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = drat)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()
```

## `{plotly}`

```{r }
plot_ly(data = mtcars, mode = "markers", type = "scatter") |>
  add_trace(x = ~ mpg, y = ~drat)
```

mtcars |>
